PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Build Info: This builds revolves around scaling two quantites: reduced mana reserved and increased aura effect. We want to get more reduced mana reserved to be able to cast more auras. We want more aura effect to be able to scale these auras. We pick up every node on the tree that has these quantities. Gear in the game with mana reservation: Skyforths, Shaper shields, Prism Guardian, Alpha's Howl, Heretic's Veil, Corrupted Jewels, Victario's Influence, Saqawal's Nest, Conqueror's Efficiency Gear in the game with aura effect: Corrupted Rings, Amulets, Belts. Victarios, Conqueror's Potency (I'd recommend looking up all that gear to get an idea of what it does).
There are 4 important damage auras in the game: wrath, anger, smite, haste. We want all of these to be as high level as possible. (Phys builds scale with hatred, but almost all meta builds don't scale phys). Victario's Influence links any socketed gems to level 30 generosity. We want to link wrath anger and smite to generosity. We could link haste to generosity, but we would lose a decent chunk of movement speed, which hurts since we are a phase run build. We want to avoid putting any important defensive auras in the chest.
There are 4 important defensive auras: discipline, purity of ice, purity of fire, purity of lightning. Grace is also a decent defensive aura, and would be the next aura we fit in with better gear. We only want the purities to be level 23, since they dont give any more max res cap after 23. We want discipline to be as high as possible
We are an ES build, so we either go shav/solarica to get chaos damage to not bypass es, or we go CI to avoid chaos damage all together. This build goes CI primarily to wear Victario's Influence. The downside of going ES is that we cannot go blood magic. Blood magic has the best mana reservation node in the game behind it: a 50% less multiplier. This effectively allows us to cast twice as many auras. This is the only mana reservation node on the tree we do not get.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Important: -Need poison pantheon (use divine vessel with desert springs map)
Buying Notes: -Vicatarios must be 15% effect of non-curse auras -get high roll on maximum es on ephemeral edge
Possible additions: -Vigilant Strike + The Vigil -Decoy Totem -Enduring Cry -Animate Guardian
EE: -I prefer to use cold snap for EE (since it creates chilling ground) -Can link to blind if open sockets
Vaal Skills: Want to run Soul Ripper (replace rumis with this). Soul Catcher is a fine substitution, but not as good With soul ripper: Scale as much increased duration as possible with vaal skills then follow this routine: -When soul ripper and vaal skills are available, use flask, then immediately use vaal skills during flask -Don't use soul ripper or vaal skills until all available again -Repeat.
Flasks: -I prefer multilayered defense flasks: stibnite, basalt, rumis -Some people go all in with elemental resistance flasks: ruby, sapphire, topaz
Improvements: -lvl 21 purities (or a lvl 2 empower in the helm when have more reduced mana reserved) -higher level wrath/anger/smite in chest -Ultimately want to run grace -Can run perquil's toe if have enough mana reservation on gear
$$ Upgrades: -Skyforths -+1 socketed gems/+2 aoe gems/+2 aura gems Victario's Influence (only need 4 link) -Reduced Mana reserved jewels -Wrath corrupt implicit jewelry/bated breath/amulet -Either Resolute Technique or area of effect as corrupt on ephemeral edge
Best Helm Enchants: 1) Smite Increased Aura Effect 2) Reduced Mana Reservation of any aura we use thats not in victarios
Gear Substitutions: -Belt: Ascent From Flesh -Amulet: Perquils Toe with enough mana reservation, aul's uprising (purity of light/disc) -Boots: Steppan Eard or rare
Tree Alternatives: -With enough res on jewels can go on left side instead of south from ascendent. Pros: get barbarism for +1 max fire res, Cons: lose a lot of all res -Essence surge is a good node to pick up -Potency of Will good cluster with soul ripper -Unnatural instincts south of ascendent gives res, block, skill effect duration -If you have enough mana reservation for grace + determination, one can consider going for iron reflexes + grace + determination (this gives roughly 60k armour) -If running enduring cry can consider running left side of tree and picking up the two additional endurance charges
Optional CWDT: -cwdt - bone offering - immortal call (use appropriate level gems)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Trade Searches: Amulet open prefix: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Delve/0V2KV7ig Amulet: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Delve/LnMRKYCn
Shield open prefix: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Delve/KmMRZ6C5 Shield: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Delve/W9e3MRum
Ring (wrath corrupt): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Delve/pGdDKeS0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ADVANCED:
(very situational) Tricks: -Can use might of the meek right of scion start to affect the leadership cluster. Effect: Gain 2% reduced mana, Lose 3% effect of aura's, 50% decreased area of effect of non-curse aura skills, gain some res from the southern res nodes -Can use mana reserved intuitive leap for essence surge
Cheap Mana reserved jewels: -Assassin's Haste -Jewels with int/% es -Vigil
In order for the 90% socketed multiplier helm to be worth instead of reduced mana reservation helm you need the total mana reservation of your auras in helm to sum to over 70%
mana reserved calculation: -Three sources of multipliers: mana multiplier, inc/dec mana reserved, less/more mana reserved - First applies mana multiplier then floors - Applies less then ceilings - Applies reduced then ceilings (If any of these are increases instead of reductions, it switches the floor/ceiling)
